title: Secondary Attachments
description: Johnny Spector is a newly divorced author, a popular English teacher in inner-city Chicago, and an honorary member of the Cobras - one of the many gangs at Freddie Prinze High School. On the verge of being fired and caught in the middle of the violence surrounding his students, he grows increasingly disillusioned until he meets 18 year old senior Marlyn Valentin.
author: Greg Herriges
